cta.title: Prêt à entrer dans la légende ?
cta.subtitle: Créez votre compte, suivez vos équipes préférées et vivez les compétitions autrement, en direct.

hero.title: BET TO LEGEND
hero.description: Bet To Legend est une plateforme de paris E-sport pensée pour les joueurs, les fans et les structures. Notre objectif : rendre les paris E-sport aussi fluides, rapides et sécurisés que le jeu lui-même.

liveBetting.title: Paris E-Sport en direct
liveBetting.description: Suivez les matchs en temps réel, placez vos paris en quelques secondes et gardez le contrôle grâce à une interface claire, responsive et pensée pour limiter la charge cognitive dans les moments clés.

mission.title: Notre mission
mission.body1: Créer une expérience de paris E-sport qui respecte le rythme des compétitions, les joueurs et les communautés. Nous voulons réduire la friction à chaque étape : compréhension des cotes, navigation, placements de paris et suivi des résultats.
mission.body2: L’interface est conçue pour accompagner l'utilisateur pendant tout le match : hiérarchie visuelle claire, boutons facilement cliquables (Fitts’s law), feedback immédiat sur chaque action et lecture rapide des informations critiques.

product.title: Une plateforme pensée produit
product.readabilityDescription: Contenu structuré, informations essentielles toujours au-dessus de la ligne de flottaison, contrastes conformes aux standards d’accessibilité (WCAG).
product.flowDescription: Interactions optimisées pour des mises en contexte rapides : score, cote, temps de jeu, statut du pari.
product.securityDescription: Mesures anti-fraude, suivi d’historique et transparence sur chaque transaction.

items.title: Expérience ultra-réactive
items.text: Interface optimisée pour les matchs intenses : transitions fluides, délais minimisés et retours visuels clairs pour garder l'utilisateur focus sur l'essentiel.

items.title: Design centré utilisateur
items.text: Architecture en composants (faible charge cognitive), affordances explicites et état de chaque action facilement lisible, même en multi-task (stream + paris).

items.title: Pensé pour les équipes & communautés
items.text: Misez sur vos équipes préférées, suivez vos rosters et partagez vos paris avec votre communauté, tout en gardant un cadre maîtrisé et sécurisé.

items.title: Transparence
items.text: Des règles claires, des cotes explicites, un historique toujours accessible. Ici, rien n’est caché.

items.title: Responsabilité
items.text: Outils de limitation, rappels et indicateurs pour un usage sain et maîtrisé de la plateforme.

items.title: Passion du jeu
items.text: Nous venons du jeu, pour les joueurs. L’expérience est pensée pour respecter l’intensité et la magie des compétitions.

cta.title: Ready to enter the legend?
cta.subtitle: Create your account, follow your favorite teams, and experience competitions in a new way.

hero.title: BET TO LEGEND
hero.description: Bet To Legend is an esports betting platform designed for players, fans, and organizations. Our goal: make esports betting as fluid, fast, and secure as the game itself.

liveBetting.title: Live e-sports betting
liveBetting.description: Follow matches in real time, place your bets in seconds, and stay in control with a clear, responsive interface built to reduce cognitive load during key moments.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.body1: Create an esports betting experience that respects the rhythm of competitions, the players, and communities. We aim to reduce friction at every step: understanding odds, navigation, bet placement, and result tracking.
mission.body2: The interface is designed to guide the user throughout the match: clear visual hierarchy, click-friendly buttons (Fitts’s law), instant feedback on every action, and fast readability of critical information.

product.title: A product-driven platform
product.readabilityDescription: Structured content, essential information always above the fold, and contrast that meets accessibility standards (WCAG).
product.flowDescription: Optimized interactions for quick context switching: score, odds, game time, and bet status.
product.securityDescription: Anti-fraud measures, history tracking, and transparency on each transaction.

items.title: Ultra-responsive experience
items.text: Optimized interface for intense matches: smooth transitions, minimal delays, and clear visual feedback.

items.title: User-centered design
items.text: Component-based architecture (low cognitive load), explicit affordances, and clearly readable states, even in multi-task scenarios.

items.title: Built for teams & communities
items.text: Bet on your favorite teams, follow rosters, and share your bets with your community in a safe, controlled environment.

items.title: Transparency
items.text: Clear rules, explicit odds, and always-accessible history. Nothing is hidden.

items.title: Responsibility
items.text: Tools, reminders, and indicators that encourage healthy and controlled use of the platform.

items.title: Passion for gaming
items.text: We come from gaming, for gamers. The experience is crafted to respect the intensity and magic of competition.

cta.title: 전설이 될 준비가 되셨나요?
cta.subtitle: 계정을 만들고 좋아하는 팀을 팔로우하며 새로운 방식으로 경쟁을 경험하세요.

hero.title: BET TO LEGEND
hero.description: Bet To Legend는 플레이어, 팬, 그리고 팀을 위해 설계된 e-스포츠 베팅 플랫폼입니다. 우리의 목표는 e-스포츠 베팅을 게임만큼 빠르고 안전하게 만드는 것입니다.

liveBetting.title: 실시간 e-스포츠 베팅
liveBetting.description: 실시간 경기 흐름을 확인하고 몇 초 만에 베팅하며, 명확하고 반응성 높은 UI로 중요한 순간에도 집중력을 유지하세요.

mission.title: 우리의 미션
mission.body1: 경기의 리듬과 플레이어, 커뮤니티를 존중하는 e-스포츠 베팅 경험을 제공합니다. 우리는 배당 이해, 내비게이션, 베팅 과정, 결과 추적까지 모든 단계에서 마찰을 줄이고자 합니다.
mission.body2: UI는 경기 전체에서 사용자를 돕도록 설계되었습니다: 명확한 시각 계층 구조, 클릭하기 쉬운 버튼, 각 행동에 대한 즉각적인 피드백, 핵심 정보의 빠른 판독.

product.title: 제품 중심 플랫폼
product.readabilityDescription: 구조화된 콘텐츠, 항상 화면 상단에 있는 핵심 정보, WCAG 접근성 기준을 준수하는 대비.
product.flowDescription: 점수, 배당률, 경기 시간, 베팅 상태 등 핵심 정보에 빠르게 접근할 수 있도록 최적화된 상호작용.
product.securityDescription: 부정 방지 시스템, 거래 기록 추적, 그리고 높은 수준의 투명성.

items.title: 초고속 반응성
items.text: 격렬한 경기 상황을 위해 최적화된 인터페이스: 부드러운 전환, 최소 지연, 명확한 피드백을 제공합니다.

items.title: 사용자 중심 설계
items.text: 컴포넌트 기반 아키텍처(낮은 인지 부하), 명확한 어포던스, 멀티태스킹 상황에서도 쉽게 읽히는 상태 표시.

items.title: 팀 & 커뮤니티 중심
items.text: 좋아하는 팀에 베팅하고, 로스터를 팔로우하며, 커뮤니티와 베팅을 공유하면서도 통제된 안전한 환경을 유지합니다.

items.title: 투명성
items.text: 명확한 규칙, 이해하기 쉬운 배당률, 언제든 확인 가능한 기록.

items.title: 책임감
items.text: 건강한 사용 습관을 돕는 한도 설정, 리마인더, 인디케이터를 제공합니다.

items.title: 게임에 대한 열정
items.text: 우리는 게이머로서, 게이머를 위해 경험을 설계합니다.
